Artemis/Slugde:
Slugde slowly went to the ship, and Artemis walked where Pacifix was 
and said "Excuse me Commander, all things are almost done when will 
we leave Cybertron?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., rauq@t... wrote:
> --- Pacifix ---
> 
> Pacifix only smiles at the friendly barbs, "We are heading out to 
> Earth. We intercepted a suspicious Decepticon signal, decrypted it. 
> We then discovered that the Decepticons had been landed on Earth 
and 
> were gainging power. They were dominating the planet, and we cannot 
> let any Decepticons get away with any sort of cruelty. We also 
> discovered that they weren't the only ones there. There are a few 
> factions who the Pred Council figured would be able to stand for a 
> while before falling to the supposed Decepticon might. The Autobot 
> Council has since started this project to send a ship secretly to 
the 
> planet to balance the power and, if possible, grab the Decepticon 
> foot before it stretches too far around the globe. I am Sub-
Commander 
> Pacifix, and in charge of this mission (In the presence of 
Ironhide, 
> Pacifix is Sub-Commander). I ask you again, will you join our 
cause?" 
> He watches the two bots reactions impassivly. (I know Pacifix is 
> being kinda trusting, but I wanna get off planet soon! =P)
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::Repugnus::
> > "Yea, you guys absolutely sucked"
